### 5.
$m = 0.3 kg$ \
$\omega = \frac{3 \pi}{5} rad \cdot s^-1$ \
$y = 0.2 m$ \

$F = -k \cdot y$ \
$F = -m \cdot \omega^2 y$ \
$F = 0.21 N$ \

### 6. 
$m = 0.2 kg$ \
$y_m = 0.02 m$ \
$f = 5 Hz$ \

$E = \frac{k \cdot y_m^2}{2}$ \
$\sqrt{\frac{k}{m}} = 2 \pi f$ \
$k = 197.38 N \cdot m^-1$ \
$E = 0.039 J$ \
